page.title: 18CHICKEN REARING
page.content: My father is employed looking after chickens for Invernairn Products who also sell swimming pools.There are 54000 chickens in one shed.They are taken in at two days old and taken away at 4 to 5 weeks old to be slaughtered for the shops.The sheds were built in 1964.There are three other companies that help Invernairn Products,namely Grampian Chickens, General Chip, and North Eastern. Grampian Chickens stock day old chicks .General Chip stock wood chips and North Eastern stock feed.These all help Invernairn Products.There is always a worry of suffocation because car noises from outside frighten the chickens causing them to run into one corner of the shed.They are not kept in separate boxes but in one big shed heated by gas fan heaters.
